-e ---

scratch is clearly onomatopoetic, yet it clearly belongs to the strong PIE root *(s)ker “to cut”

scrit scriptscrape graphit kratta “to rake” kratzen scar

𓆣
ج ر ب ʒ-r-b:jarab:scarab:scratch
ج ر ح ʒ-r-h scar
ج ر د ʒ-r-d scratch,scrap
ج ر ف ʒ-r-ph scrape:shovel,sweep
ح ر ش h-r-š scratch
ح ر س h-r-s Heeres guards ⇔ house
ح ر ب h-r-b Heer, guerre
خ ر ط ḵ-r-th kreis:scratch:turnery

𓐍 𓏏 𓂷 𓂡 | carve, engrave | grate גֵּרֵד geréd > cut grabar grábháil scrape < graphit [p already lost !]
𓐍 𓏏 𓂷 𓂡 | carve, engrave | kaivertaa
𓐍 𓏏 𓂷 𓂡 | carve, engrave | χαράσσω kharássō

𓋴 𓂓 𓏏 𓍁 𓈇 𓏥 | ploughland | PIE √(s)ker “to cut” carucate Scharte scratch

𒋦 SUḪUR scratch 𒋦 SUḪUR scher! (cut hair)
𒋦 SUḪUR ≈ 𒎗𒋨𒎗 ŠAR² ≈ 𒎗𒋓𒎗 SIR 𒋓

𓎡 𓂋 𓊪 𓂷 𓂡 | scrape |

scratch <> scrape > schab 𒈰 sub₅ shave (sheep Schafe) 𒋗𒄿 šuᵖi šuᵖi סַפָּר sapár barber

𒆠𒄯 ki.hur scratch(earth) coçar კაწვრა ḳac̣vra გაკაწვრა gaḳac̣vra ӽарпть ẋarpț schaben 𒆠𒄯 ki.hur scratch(earth) gërryej քերծել kʿercel քորել kʿorel karãi خَرْبَش ḵarbaš carve krabben krassen 𒆠𒄯 ki.hur scratch(earth) grate גֵּרֵד geréd 긁다 s'gratar s'kratsima kratz scratch scărpina خراشیدن xarâšidan ξύω xúō

𓋴 𓄡 𓎡 𓂋 𓐬 | decorate, adorn, burnish | s'carve

𓄿 𓄡 𓂝 𓂷 | scratch, scrape, carve, engrave | a'scra… ☑ ++ !!

𓋴 𓈎 𓂋 𓂡 scar (wound, injury) 𓋴 𓈎 𓂋 𓂡 strike <> scratch

𒂊𒆠𒆪 e-ke-ku •ᵍ-kar-çu
𒂊𒆠𒆪 to scratch

𒄭𒊑𒌅 ḫi-ri-tu ⇔ scratch
𒄭𒊑𒌅 an ornament, channel, ditch
⇔
𒄭𒊒 ḫe-ruᵛ carve
𒄭𒊒 to dig

𒄢 cat 𒄢𒈝 Kater •catlim catˡ חֲתוּלָה khatulá חָתוּל khatúl cult gulᵗum ⇔

𓍶 𓋪 𓃉 𓋪

𓏘 𓂋 𓂋 𓏏 𓋪 karta कर्त "hole" < कृत् kṛt "cut" 𓃉 𓋪 Kreis *krītaną “to scratch; carve ” κίρκος kírkos, “circle, ring” cyclos 𓍶 κρίκος kríkos

𒇯𒁺;𒌗𒁺 du₆re дра́пать drápatʹ 𒌗𒁺 ʸaraḥ.du ξύω גֵּרֵד geréd ˢgërrith scratch
